languages.text: "Он проповедует покаяние". {n}Владайм несколько секунд сохраняет каменное лицо, но затем не выдерживает, и на губах его расплывается саркастическая улыбка.{/n} "Чорда прислала его, чтобы заставить нас, смутьянов и бунтарей, сложить оружие".

"He preaches repentance." {n}Vladaym remains stone-faced for a few seconds before giving in and letting a sarcastic smile form on his lips.{/n} "Chorda sent him here to make us lay down our arms and renounce our rebellious ways."
languages.original_text: "Он проповедует покаяние". {n}Владайм несколько секунд сохраняет каменное лицо, но затем не выдерживает, и на губах его расплывается саркастическая улыбка.{/n} "Чорда прислала его, чтобы заставить нас, смутьянов и бунтарей, сложить оружие".

traits.locale_text: "He preaches penance." {n}Vladaym remains stone-faced for a few seconds before giving in and letting a sarcastic smile form on his lips.{/n} "Chorda sent him here to make us lay down our arms and renounce our rebellious ways."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "He preaches repentance." {n}Vladaym remains stone-faced for a few seconds before giving in and letting a sarcastic smile form on his lips.{/n} "Chorda sent him here to make us lay down our arms and renounce our rebellious ways."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “他是来宣扬忏悔的。”{n}弗拉迪姆面无表情等了几秒钟，最后无奈地笑了起来，露出一丝嘲讽的微笑。{/n}“是库尔达派他来的。他打算说服我们放下武器，停止这场起义。”
languages.original_text: "He preaches repentance." {n}Vladaym remains stone-faced for a few seconds before giving in and letting a sarcastic smile form on his lips.{/n} "Chorda sent him here to make us lay down our arms and renounce our rebellious ways."

traits.locale_text: “他是来宣扬忏悔的。”{n}弗拉迪姆面无表情等了几秒钟，最后无奈地笑了起来，露出一丝嘲讽的微笑。{/n}“是库尔达派他来的。他打算说服我们放下武器，停止这场起义。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「彼は悔い改めを説いている」{n}ヴラダイムは数秒間固まったあと、突然皮肉な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「チョーダが彼をここに送り込んだんだ。私たちに武器と反逆の道を捨てさせるためにな」
languages.original_text: "He preaches repentance." {n}Vladaym remains stone-faced for a few seconds before giving in and letting a sarcastic smile form on his lips.{/n} "Chorda sent him here to make us lay down our arms and renounce our rebellious ways."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は悔い改めを説いている」{n}ヴラダイムは数秒間固まったあと、突然皮肉な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「チョーダが彼をここに送り込んだんだ。私たちに武器と反逆の道を捨てさせるためにな」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Predica el arrepentimiento». {n}Vladaym se queda petrificado unos segundos antes de dejar que una sonrisa sarcástica se forme en sus labios.{/n} «Chorda lo envió aquí para que bajásemos las armas y renunciáramos a nuestra rebeldía».
languages.original_text: "He preaches repentance." {n}Vladaym remains stone-faced for a few seconds before giving in and letting a sarcastic smile form on his lips.{/n} "Chorda sent him here to make us lay down our arms and renounce our rebellious ways."

traits.locale_text: «Predica el arrepentimiento». {n}Vladaym se queda petrificado unos segundos antes de dejar que una sonrisa sarcástica se forme en sus labios.{/n} «Chorda lo envió aquí para que bajásemos las armas y renunciáramos a nuestra rebeldía».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Er predigt Reue und Buße." {n}Vladayms Miene bleibt einige Sekunden lang wie versteinert, dann gibt er nach und erlaubt einem sarkastischen Grinsen, sich auf seinen Lippen breitzumachen.{/n} "Chorda hat ihn geschickt, damit er uns dazu bringt, die Waffen niederzulegen und unserer rebellischen Natur zu widersagen."
languages.original_text: "He preaches repentance." {n}Vladaym remains stone-faced for a few seconds before giving in and letting a sarcastic smile form on his lips.{/n} "Chorda sent him here to make us lay down our arms and renounce our rebellious ways."

traits.locale_text: "Er predigt Reue und Buße." {n}Vladayms Miene bleibt einige Sekunden lang wie versteinert, dann gibt er nach und erlaubt einem sarkastischen Grinsen, sich auf seinen Lippen breitzumachen.{/n} "Chorda hat ihn geschickt, damit er uns dazu bringt, die Waffen niederzulegen und unserer rebellischen Natur zu widersagen.
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Il prêche le repentir. » {n}Vladaym reste de marbre quelques secondes, mais il ne parvient pas à réprimer plus longtemps un sourire sarcastique.{/n} « C'est Chorda qui l'a envoyé ici pour nous convaincre de déposer les armes et de renoncer à notre rébellion. »
languages.original_text: "He preaches repentance." {n}Vladaym remains stone-faced for a few seconds before giving in and letting a sarcastic smile form on his lips.{/n} "Chorda sent him here to make us lay down our arms and renounce our rebellious ways."

traits.locale_text: « Il prêche le repentir. » {n}Vladaym reste de marbre quelques secondes, mais il ne parvient pas à réprimer plus longtemps un sourire sarcastique.{/n} « C'est Chorda qui l'a envoyé ici pour nous convaincre de déposer les armes et de renoncer à notre rébellion. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Tövbe vaazları vermekle meşgul." {n}Suratında duygu emaresi olmayan Vladaym, bir müddet daldıktan sonra alaylı bir gülümsemeyle buzları eritiyor.{/n} "Silah bırakıp isyankârlığımızdan vazgeçelim diye Chorda göndermiş onu."
languages.original_text: "He preaches repentance." {n}Vladaym remains stone-faced for a few seconds before giving in and letting a sarcastic smile form on his lips.{/n} "Chorda sent him here to make us lay down our arms and renounce our rebellious ways."

traits.locale_text: "Tövbe vaazları vermekle meşgul." {n}Vladaym, suratında duygu emaresi olmadan bir müddet daldıktan sonra alaylı bir gülümsemeyle buzları eritiyor.{/n} "Silah bırakıp isyankârlığımızdan vazgeçelim diye Chorda göndermiş onu."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
